title: Need For Speed Hot Pursuit 2 Music Patch Vol 3 (including online
description:
KTZ Records is Back!!!
The new music patch for the "Need For Speed - Hot Pursuit 2" is here.
I made this very easy to install (just a few clicks!) because some of you had
trouble with the vol. 1 and 2. So here it is! 50 brand new tracks for the game.
By installing this you also get a "no-cd play fix" (works online) and 3 traffic
vehicles, for your online server.
So enjoy this release and plz seed it.

WARNING!
Some of the songs include expicit lyrics!!!
If you find any of the tracks below offensive you better, DON&#039;T download this.

TRACKLIST
-------------

- The Bitter End
